name: Flexprice
tagline: Usage-based pricing and metering for developers
description: Flexprice is a billing platform that helps launch & iterate pricing without dev bottlenecks. üîì Cloud or self-hosted ‚öôÔ∏è No-code UI üí∞ Usage-based pricing & metering üéü Credits & top-ups üîë Control feature access üîó Works with Stripe, Chargebee, & more

name: Databutton MCP
tagline: Give your app AI superpowers with MCPs
description: For those of you who live under a rock, Databutton lets you build and deploy full-stack apps with AI. Today, we're launching Databutton MCPs, which lets you talk to your Databutton apps with natural language. Available in Claude, Cursor, OpenAI, and Agno.

name: PyUI Builder
tagline: Build Python GUIs like Canva
description: A GUI builder for python. Create tkinter, Customtk, Kivy and PySide using GUI builder. Supports 3rd party libraries and generates clean Python code

name: Scout
tagline: Instant Marketplace Alerts
description: Never miss a steal on Facebook Marketplace again. Scout instantly alerts you about products you're interested in, saving you hours spent scrolling and refreshing for new listings.

name: Amazon Buy for Me
tagline: AI Agent that shops in other sites
description: Amazon Buy for Me uses an AI agent within the Amazon app to purchase items for you directly from other brand websites when Amazon doesn't stock them.

name: Wishoom
tagline: Send a message to the universe
description: Send a message to the universe using laser transmission. Fully encrypted, private and secure.

name: FrameShare
tagline: Social share plugin for Framer
description: The first Framer plugin that lets you easily add social share buttons to your Framer website. Let visitors share your website to their social media accounts to increase traffic and build social proof.

name: ZippCall
tagline: Cheap international calls in your web-browser
description: Make cheap international calls directly from your browser with ZippCall. No downloads, no subscriptions, just affordable rates and crystal-clear quality.

name: Thumb Zone AI
tagline: Emotion AI for user testing & product experience
description: Thumb Zone uses AI to help companies design more user-friendly apps and perform usability testing with smaller teams. It helps them iterate 10x faster and 15x cheaper to build better products.

name: ArbitrageOne
tagline: Amazon Reselling & Arbitrage Software
description: Automate your Amazon Reselling business and boost efficiency with ArbitrageOne. Track all key KPIs in one place, streamline sourcing, and optimize your workflow effortlessly. Stay in control, save time, and scale smarter.

name: Dreamchanted
tagline: Turn your photos into magical art
description: Dreamchanted transforms your boring photos into magical art!

name: CocoKits
tagline: Design System with unstyled Angular & React components
description: Cocokits is built for both designers and developers, providing a powerful, flexible system to easily create performant, enterprise-grade products. CocoKits includes clean architecture, flexible SDK, and framework-agnostic support for multiple design systems.

name: Feeedback
tagline: Decode customer feedback and build what matters
description: Understanding your customers is the key to growth, but collecting and analyzing feedback can be overwhelming. Feeedback is your AI-powered solution to gather real-time user reviews, track churn, and uncover actionable insights to shape the future of your SaaS

name: MailCheck
tagline: Stop Free Trial Abuse with Advanced Email Verification
description: MailCheck is an advanced email verification API that helps businesses validate email addresses in real-time. Identify and block disposable email addresses to prevent free trial abuse and ensure you collect only high-quality, deliverable email addresses.

name: ImgFiber - Lossless Image compression!
tagline: Shrink file size without losing quality ‚Äì Completely FREE!
description: 100% Free! No File Size Limits! Processed Locally! (Nothing gets sent to our servers, everything happens right on your browser) This is NOT A FFmpeg wrapper! ImgFiber offers 10x better results compared to ANY current alternatives. try it now.

name: Insider Alert
tagline: Get insider trade alerts the moment they come out
description: Insider Alert is a real-time notification platform that keeps you instantly updated on insider trading activity. By tracking SEC Form 4 filings, it lets you know the moment executives, directors, or major shareholders buy or sell shares.

name: CardStack
tagline: Create beautiful developer profile cards
description: Create and share beautiful developer cards to showcase your projects, tech stack, and socials. Customize with themes and fonts, get a unique URL + QR code, and track views. Free to use and perfect for portfolios, resumes, or networking!

name: Floramis Walk
tagline: The cutest walking app you will ever see!
description: A tamagotchi-esque step tracker that lets you scan real plants and turn them into virtual pets.

name: AI Safeguard
tagline: Prevent sensitive data leaks in popular LLM's like ChatGPT
description: A Chrome extension + admin dashboard to help teams safely use popular AI tools like ChatGPT, Copilot, and Gemini. AI Safeguard prevents sensitive data (like emails, credentials, or PII) from being sent to AI models ‚Äî without blocking AI use.

name: StartupMate
tagline: Validate Your Startup Idea Using AI
description: Turning Ideas Into Investable Startups. We help entrepreneurs validate their Startup ideas and turn them into investable startups. Our AI algorithm analyzes Startup ideas and prevents the user from spending time and money on bad or mediocre ideas.
